name: Rosary [1]
description: Blessed by God, it is a cross-shaped necklace.

name: Rose Handkerchief
description: Rose hidden my love, This is not spring, My heart is beating strongly because of you. I am anxious waiting for the day, Waiting for your words. For this scene, I have practiced saying yes every single day.

name: Rose Quartz
description: A woven and interlaced cross-belt made of red fabric. Being a very rare item, it can be used to make high-end headwear.

name: Rose Witch Hat
description: Popular among young devils for its mysterious smell, the saying goes, "if you wear it, a strong rosy scent will around you in the moonlight."

name: Rosette Headband
description: Pink rosette! That is where girls belongs, double the happiness!

name: Rotten Bandage
description: Old bandages that don't seem to have any value. I wonder what you can make with them?

name: Rough Elunium
description: 5 pieces can be extracted into the Elunium required for equipment refining.

name: Rough Oridecon
description: A mineral known as Oridecon, 5 of which can be extracted into Oridecon required for equipment refining.

name: Rough repairing shard
description: Scientist Eric Snow discovered that some Crystal can be used to repair the Gashapon Headwears of Kafra Co. But different Headwears need Crystal of different quality to repair. Unrefined Crystal shard can be used to repair Gashapon Headwear of green quality.

name: Rough Runestone
description: The basic crafting material for various Runestones

name: Rough Wind
description: The ore with wind attribute. After use, Your attack turns into wind attribute and the effect lasts 15 minutes.

name: Round Buckleer
description: A common round shield. The circular part is covered with thick Elunium, increasing the shield's defense.

name: Round Buckleer [1]
description: A common round shield. The circular part is covered with thick Elunium, increasing the shield's defense.

name: Royal Ceremony Chest
description: Open it to receive Mysterious Box 3.0 ×1, Royal Ceremony Lucky Bag 1 ×1

name: Royal Ceremony Lucky Bag
description: Royal Ceremony Lucky Bag. Open it and you will get Love and Bravery 2018 Blueprint or other precious items

name: Royal Ceremony Lucky Bag 2
description: The one bought in Big Cat Coins

name: Royal Cook Chest IV
description: You now have a complete standard on the food taste, Color and fragrance, and you can point out the problems in the cooking process. Please try these dishes cooked by high-ranked chefs. (Open the pack to find 4-star food)
